casebody.data:
Overberg, Admr., et al., Appellants, v. State Farm Mutual Automobile Insurance Co., Appellee.

[Cite as Overberg v. State Farm Mut. Auto. Ins. Co. (1988), 38 Ohio St. 3d 125.]

(No. 88-531 Submitted July 5, 1988 Decided August 3, 1988.) *126Kimpel, Hyland, Weinkam & Goodson and Brett Goodson, for appellants. Schwartz, Manes & Ruby and Stephen J. Patsfall, for appellee.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed as to Proposition of Law No. I on authority of Wood v. Shepard (1988), 38 Ohio St. 3d 86, 526 N.E. 2d 1089, and the cause is remanded to the trial court for proceedings not inconsistent with Wood.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Locher, Holmes, Douglas, Wright and H. Brown, JJ., concur.
